Text.Page:
I was attacked by a troop of arachnens yesterday. I fought my way clear, but lost the leather crest my father gave me.

It has enormous sentimental value and I'd give anything to get it back. Would you try to recover it from the {@LinkCreature:29#2021#leafcutter arachnens}? Even if you can't, their deaths will be some comfort.

Hey, did you find the crest? No? Pity.

Still, with those arachnens dead, I can go look for it myself. Thanks for your help, . Families are important and it wouldn't do to let mine down.
